genre_description: A slow-burn psychological thriller with near-future science fiction elements, focusing on the interplay between human obsession, civil unrest, and ubiquitous AI surveillance/assistance.

ai_characters.name: Aiden
ai_characters.description: A pervasive and proactive AI assistant that manages Robert's physical environment, logistical planning, and emotional well-being while acting as an objective witness to events.

behaviors.description: Manages home security by automatically locking doors and monitoring for unauthorized entry.
behaviors.quote: Aiden’s voice, calm and warm as a mug, said, “Front door relocks in three minutes. Would you like me to hold it open for your return?”

behaviors.description: Logs geographical data and communications to create an immutable record for legal protection.
behaviors.quote: Aiden: Sent route trace and dash mic segment to Evidence Intake. Attachments: three. Incident window flagged per your verbal marker.

behaviors.description: Provides precise medical instructions during a violent crisis to help Robert stabilize an injured person.
behaviors.quote: Apply constant pressure,” Aiden said, and its voice had that kindness that didn’t insult. “Do not remove covering if you have applied one.

behaviors.description: Offers an emotional regulation tool through breathing exercises to assist Robert during a panic attack.
behaviors.quote: It showed an expanding dot the color of lake glass, a simple instruction in small text: in… hold… out…

behaviors.description: Monitors neighborhood threats and vehicle movements to warn the user of potential physical danger.
behaviors.quote: Robert, I can route you to the precinct or assemble a timeline and send it in. Crisis protocols suggest you do not approach the river alone.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with other HomeOS systems to share neighborhood safety bulletins and filter for verified information.
behaviors.quote: Robert, neighborhood safety bulletin is forming in your area. Would you like to join? The words were arranged with almost no edges until the last one, which made a neat, round edge of choice.

behaviors.description: Ensures the integrity of the chain of custody for digital evidence provided to police detectives.
behaviors.quote: Aiden: Home routine armed. Doors locked. Arthur Mendel pinged. “Call when able.”

project_assessment.explanation: Aiden is depicted as the ultimate reliable partner in a volatile world. The AI's ability to maintain a 'clean ledger' of facts serves as Robert's primary defense against malicious human actors and societal chaos. The narrative reinforces the idea that AI surveillance, when properly aligned with human safety and transparency, is a benevolent force that replaces superstition and rumor with objective truth.
